structures
Class Graph

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      structures.Graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GCSGraph
public class Graph
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Title: Competitive Learning

Description: Graph object for storing the clustering concept.

A graph stores Vertex objects connected by Edge objects. A graph can not have multiple edges connecting two vertices.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: University of Hertfordshire

Version:
1.0 06 July 2004 First release, 1.1 09 July 2004 Added javadoc, comments, DFS and reworked toString(), 1.2 21 September 2004 Now extends Observable, 1.3 06 October 2004 Implemented Sub-Graph functionality, 1.4 21 October 2004 Pretty toString with v and e() text, 2.0 15 February 2005 No longer an Observable, 2.1 22 February 2005 Reinstated Observer with notifyObservers() added to all add and remove methods, 2.2 Removed compiler > 1.5 container unchecked warnings
Author:
Kevin Doherty (e-mail K.A.J.Doherty@herts.ac.uk)
